description: Japanese barberry (Berberis thunbergii 'Royal Cloak') is an amazing shrub that is adapted to a variety of soils and provides year-round interest. It has attractive bronze-purple foliage with yellow flowers in spring and bright red berries in fall. It is an excellent choice for adding colour and structure to the landscape. Plus, it's evergreen and low-maintenance, requiring only occasional pruning if desired. It is also extremely disease resistant and deer-resistant, making it a great addition to any garden. It adds a natural touch to areas that need an extra boost of colour.
